mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store( store_name, type, license_number, address, owner_no, table_count) VALUES #{storeName }, #{storeType }, #{licenseNumber }, #{address }, #{ownerNo }, #{tableCount} );
mapper.select: SELECT store_no as storeNo, store_name as storeName, type, license_number as licenseNumber, address, owner_no as ownerNo, table_count as tableCount FROM store WHERE owner_no=#{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET store_name= #{storeName}, type= #{type}, address= #{address}, owner_no= #{owner_no}, table_count= #{tableCount} WHERE store_no = #{storeNo}
